SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.clevercash.api.service

Klasse UserService

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.clevercash.api.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class for managing users. Provides methods for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting users.
Autor:
Lilou Steffen

      Parameter:

    • updateUser

      public User updateUser(int userId, NewUserDTO newUserDTO) throws NoSuchElementException, MappingException
      Updates an existing user with new data.
      Parameter:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      newUserDTO - the new user data
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated user
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user with the specified ID is not found
      MappingException - if there is an error during mapping

    • findUserByID

      public User findUserByID(int userID)
      Finds a user by ID.
      Parameter:
      userID - the ID of the user to find
      Gibt zurück:
      the found user
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user with the specified ID is not found
